title: Jellyfish Diving Gear
summaries: Jellyfish Diving Gear is an accessory crafted by combining Jellyfish Necklace and Diving Gear at a Tinkerer's Workshop. It combines the functionalities of its ingredients, granting the ability to swim, breathe for an extended time, and emit light underwater (in the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it gives a very faint glow out of water and honey and its brightness is significantly increased when submerged) and additionally slowing the rate at which damage from drowning is taken. Apart from combining these effects into a single accessory, it does not have other unique properties.

statistics.Tooltip:
Grants the ability to swim and greatly extends underwater breathing
Generates a very subtle glow which becomes more vibrant underwater
statistics.Sell: 3
